00040 void PrintMenu::printing3() {
00041     box.tell("Now printing. \nPlease wait...");
00042     sys.no_true_output_flag=1;
00043     box.close();
00044     sys.no_true_output_flag=0;
00045 
00049     if( print_view_mode >= MODE_FIRST_NONDEPARTMENTAL_FIRM &&
00050         print_view_mode <= MODE_LAST_NONDEPARTMENTAL_FIRM ) {
00051         switch( FIRST_NONDEPARTMENTAL_FIRM_ID + print_view_mode - MODE_FIRST_NONDEPARTMENTAL_FIRM ) {
00052         case FIRM_PARK_LOTS:
00053         case FIRM_PARK_STRUCTURE: {
00054             MouseDispCount mdc;
00055             print.start_print(sys.main_hwnd,sys.app_hinstance);
00056             print.open_page();
00057 
00058             print.dfont(18,false,false,700);
00059             print.put_text("Virtual U Parking Report",20,1);
00060             print.dfont(10,false,false,0);
00061 
00062             print.put_text("Insitution : ",30,4);
00063             //Player Institution
00064             print.put_text(player_school.school_name,44,4);
00065             print.put_text("President : ",30,5);
00066             String str;
00067             str =  player_school.player_first_name;
00068             str += " ";
00069             str += player_school.player_last_name;
00070             print.put_text(str.str_buf,44,5);         //President
00071             print.put_text("Date : ",99,5);
00072             // print.put_text(date.date_str(info.game_date),107,5);                   //date
00073             print.put_text(info.date_str_julian(info.game_date), 107,5 );
00074 
00075             if(player_school.scenario_id>0) {
00076                 print.dfont(10,false,false,700);
00077                 print.put_text(scn_name[player_school.scenario_id-1],50,6);
00078             }
00079 
00080             if(print_option==1) {
00081                 user_interface.backgd_flag=0;
00082                 sys.no_true_output_flag=1;
00083 
00084                 sys.view_mode=FIRM_OLD_MAIN;
00085 
00086                 parking.deinit();
00087                 parking.parking_report(INFO_REPAINT);
00088 
00089                 print.put_vga_back_center("prn001.bmp",
00090                                           ZOOM_X2-ZOOM_X1-80,ZOOM_Y2-ZOOM_Y1-50,
00091                                           0.2,ZOOM_X1+40,ZOOM_Y1
00092                     );
00093 
00094                 sys.no_true_output_flag=0;
00095                 user_interface.backgd_flag=1;
00096                 sys.view_mode=print_view_mode;
00097 
00098                 parking.deinit();
00099                 // ###### begin Gilbert 28/04/2001 ######//
00100                 // save memory
00101                 // parking.parking_report(INFO_REPAINT);
00102                 // ###### end Gilbert 28/04/2001 ######//
00103             }
00104

00107         }
